nodes.bodyText: Let's just call this "Presto Verifier", rather than linking to the source
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -29,8 +29,8 @@ write your queries without a ``FROM`` clause or use the ``VALUES`` syntax.
 Presto Verifier
 ---------------
 
-There is a new project, :doc:`/installation/verifier`, which can be used to
-verify a set of queries against two different clusters.
+There is a new project, `Presto Verifier <https://github.com/prestosql/presto/tree/master/presto-verifier>`_,
